channel.title: Immersive Audio on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Immersive Audio on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Dolby Atmos FlexConnect Lets You Place Speakers Anywhere
item.description: This new technology now allows you to achieve excellent Dolby Atmos immersion regardless where you put a speaker in a room, but it’s currently exclusive to TCL.
